name: MLB Champions
description:
Play like an MLB Champion! Collect officially licensed MLB Digital Collectibles by playing head to head against other players in both casual and competitive modes. Just pick your favorite team, build your roster, train and Play Ball! Build your Collection and upgrade your Rosters to compete at the highest level. Climb to the top of the leaderboard and earn amazing rewards!

Features:
- Select and build your favorite MLB teams!
- Win AMAZING rewards one of a kind holiday themed bat/glove combos and unique fireworks bases!
- Compete against other fans!
- Compete for amazing rewards based on real events of the 2020 MLB season!
- Collectible 1-of-a-kind authentic MLB Figures with countless variations!
- Climb the leaderboards!
- Trade and enhance your MLB Figures!
- Bring your Figures to life with Augmented Reality!
- Digitally authenticate your Figures with real MLB player Signatures!

Share
- Join the MLB Champions collectors community on Discord and Twitter
- View your Figures in AR and Share shots of your favorite MLB Players!

Requires an Internet connection and an iPhone 7 or newer device.
